entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
